articles.title: New asteroid has 'very small chance' of hitting Earth in 2046 - BNO News
articles.description: An asteroid which was discovered late last month has a “very small chance” of impacting Earth on Valentine’s Day in 2046, NASA said on Tuesday, as astronomers worked to gather more data. 2023 DW was first discovered in Chile at the end of February and – after…
articles.content:
An asteroid which was discovered late last month has a “very small chance” of impacting Earth on Valentine’s Day in 2046, NASA said on Tuesday, as astronomers worked to gather more data.
